Operation 'osconfig.projects.locations.osPolicyAssignments.list' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary entirely. Description lacks clarity on pagination support, input parameters (parent resource path), and output structure. Added specifics about pagination, return type, and what 'latest revision' means for AI agent understanding.

data.current_description: List the OS policy assignments under the parent resource. For each OS policy assignment, the latest revision is returned.
data.summary_suggestion: List OS policy assignments with latest revisions
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all OS policy assignments under the specified parent resource (project/location). For each assignment, the latest revision is returned. Supports pagination via page_size and page_token parameters. Returns a ListOSPolicyAssignmentsResponse containing the list of assignments and a next page token if more results exist.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description lacks clarity on pagination support, input parameters (parent resource path), and output structure. Added specifics about pagination, return type, and what 'latest revision' means for AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'osconfig.projects.locations.osPolicyAssignments.create' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_side_effects. Missing summary. Description mentions LRO and cancellation but lacks clarity on what the assignment does (applies policies to VMs), what inputs are required (OSPolicyAssignment schema), and the side effect of targeting VMs. Enhanced to explain the assignment's purpose, required inputs, and operational context for AI agents.

data.current_description: Create an OS policy assignment. This method also creates the first revision of the OS policy assignment. This method returns a long running operation (LRO) that contains the rollout details. The rollout can be cancelled by cancelling the LRO. For more information, see [Method: projects.locations.osPolicyAssignments.operations.cancel](https://cloud.google.com/compute/docs/osconfig/rest/v1alpha/projects.locations.osPolicyAssignments.operations/cancel).
data.summary_suggestion: Create OS policy assignment and initiate rollout
data.description_suggestion: Creates a new OS policy assignment and automatically generates its first revision. The assignment is applied to dynamically targeted Compute Engine VM instances based on the specified labels and filters. Returns a long-running operation (LRO) containing rollout details. The rollout can be monitored or cancelled via the returned operation. Requires OSPolicyAssignment request body with policy rules, target criteria, and rollout configuration.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description mentions LRO and cancellation but lacks clarity on what the assignment does (applies policies to VMs), what inputs are required (OSPolicyAssignment schema), and the side effect of targeting VMs. Enhanced to explain the assignment's purpose, required inputs, and operational context for AI agents.

message: Operation 'osconfig.projects.locations.instances.osPolicyAssignments.reports.list' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description is vague about what reports contain (compliance status), pagination support, and return structure. Added clarity on report content (compliance status), pagination parameters, and response schema for better AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description: List OS policy assignment reports for all Compute Engine VM instances in the specified zone.
data.summary_suggestion: List OS policy compliance reports for VM instances
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves OS policy assignment compliance reports for all Compute Engine VM instances in the specified location/zone. Each report shows the compliance status of OS policy assignments on individual VMs. Supports pagination via page_size and page_token parameters. Returns a ListOSPolicyAssignmentReportsResponse containing compliance reports and a next page token if more results exist.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is vague about what reports contain (compliance status), pagination support, and return structure. Added clarity on report content (compliance status), pagination parameters, and response schema for better AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'osconfig.projects.locations.instances.vulnerabilityReports.list' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_context. Missing summary. Description lacks context about report content (CVEs, severity), pagination support, and return structure. Added specifics about vulnerability data included in reports, pagination parameters, and response schema to help AI agents understand the operation's purpose and outputs.

data.current_description: List vulnerability reports for all VM instances in the specified zone.
data.summary_suggestion: List vulnerability reports for VM instances
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves vulnerability reports for all Compute Engine VM instances in the specified location/zone. Each report contains detected vulnerabilities, CVE information, and severity assessments for the VM's operating system and installed packages. Supports pagination via page_size and page_token parameters. Returns a ListVulnerabilityReportsResponse containing vulnerability reports and a next page token if more results exist.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description lacks context about report content (CVEs, severity), pagination support, and return structure. Added specifics about vulnerability data included in reports, pagination parameters, and response schema to help AI agents understand the operation's purpose and outputs.

message: Operation 'osconfig.projects.locations.osPolicyAssignments.delete' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary entirely. Description is confusing - it states 'creates a new revision' when deleting, which contradicts the delete action. Added clear summary, clarified that deletion initiates rollout removal, specified input requirements (assignment name), and clarified output (Operation resource) for better AI agent understanding.

data.current_description: Delete the OS policy assignment. This method creates a new revision of the OS policy assignment. This method returns a long running operation (LRO) that contains the rollout details. The rollout can be cancelled by cancelling the LRO. If the LRO completes and is not cancelled, all revisions associated with the OS policy assignment are deleted. For more information, see [Method: projects.locations.osPolicyAssignments.operations.cancel](https://cloud.google.com/compute/docs/osconfig/rest/v1alpha/projects.locations.osPolicyAssignments.operations/cancel).
data.summary_suggestion: Delete OS policy assignment and initiate rollout
data.description_suggestion: Deletes the specified OS policy assignment and initiates an asynchronous rollout to remove the assignment from all targeted VM instances. This operation returns a long-running operation (LRO) containing rollout details. The rollout can be cancelled by cancelling the LRO. If the LRO completes without cancellation, all revisions associated with the OS policy assignment are permanently deleted. Requires the OS policy assignment name as input. Returns an Operation resource that can be monitored for completion status.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description is confusing - it states 'creates a new revision' when deleting, which contradicts the delete action. Added clear summary, clarified that deletion initiates rollout removal, specified input requirements (assignment name), and clarified output (Operation resource) for better AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'osconfig.projects.locations.instances.vulnerabilityReports.get' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description lacks input/output details and doesn't explain what a vulnerability report contains. data.current_description: Gets the vulnerability report for the specified VM instance. Only VMs with inventory data have vulnerability reports associated with them.
data.summary_suggestion: Retrieve vulnerability report for VM instance
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the vulnerability report for a specified Compute Engine VM instance. The report contains vulnerability information detected on the instance. Only VM instances with inventory data have associated vulnerability reports. Requires the VM instance name as input. Returns a VulnerabilityReport resource containing vulnerability details, or an error if no report exists for the instance.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description lacks input/output details and doesn't explain what a vulnerability report contains. Added summary, clarified input requirement (instance name), specified return type (VulnerabilityReport resource), and explained the condition for report availability for AI agent clarity.

message: Operation 'osconfig.projects.locations.osPolicyAssignments.patch' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Missing summary. Description lacks clarity about side effects (new revision creation, rollout initiation) and output details. Added summary, clarified that updates create new revisions and trigger rollouts, specified input type (OSPolicyAssignment), mentioned partial update support, and clarified LRO return value for better AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description: Update an existing OS policy assignment. This method creates a new revision of the OS policy assignment. This method returns a long running operation (LRO) that contains the rollout details. The rollout can be cancelled by cancelling the LRO. For more information, see [Method: projects.locations.osPolicyAssignments.operations.cancel](https://cloud.google.com/compute/docs/osconfig/rest/v1alpha/projects.locations.osPolicyAssignments.operations/cancel).
data.summary_suggestion: Update OS policy assignment and trigger rollout
data.description_suggestion: Updates an existing OS policy assignment with new configuration. This operation creates a new revision of the OS policy assignment and initiates an asynchronous rollout to apply the updated policies to all targeted VM instances. Returns a long-running operation (LRO) containing rollout details and status. The rollout can be cancelled by cancelling the LRO. Accepts an OSPolicyAssignment resource with updated fields. Partial updates are supported - only provided fields will be modified.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description lacks clarity about side effects (new revision creation, rollout initiation) and output details. Added summary, clarified that updates create new revisions and trigger rollouts, specified input type (OSPolicyAssignment), mentioned partial update support, and clarified LRO return value for better AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'osconfig.projects.locations.osPolicyAssignments.listRevisions' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary. Description is too minimal - lacks input/output details and context about what revisions represent. Added summary, explained what revisions are (versions created on create/update), specified input requirement (assignment name), clarified return type and structure (ListOSPolicyAssignmentRevisionsResponse with pagination), and mentioned ordering for AI agent understanding.

data.current_description: List the OS policy assignment revisions for a given OS policy assignment.
data.summary_suggestion: List all revisions of OS policy assignment
data.description_suggestion: Lists all revisions of a specified OS policy assignment. Each revision represents a version of the assignment created when the assignment was created or updated. Requires the OS policy assignment name as input. Returns a ListOSPolicyAssignmentRevisionsResponse containing a list of OSPolicyAssignment revisions and pagination information. Revisions are ordered by creation time, with the most recent first.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description is too minimal - lacks input/output details and context about what revisions represent. Added summary, explained what revisions are (versions created on create/update), specified input requirement (assignment name), clarified return type and structure (ListOSPolicyAssignmentRevisionsResponse with pagination), and mentioned ordering for AI agent understanding.

data.current_description: List OS policies compliance data for all Compute Engine VM instances in the specified zone.
data.summary_suggestion: List OS policy compliance status for VM instances
data.description_suggestion: Lists OS policy compliance data for all Compute Engine VM instances in a specified location. The compliance data shows whether each instance is compliant with assigned OS policies. Requires the parent location path as input. Returns a ListInstanceOSPoliciesCompliancesResponse containing compliance status for each instance and pagination information. Results can be filtered and sorted using query parameters.
data.reasoning: Missing summary. Description lacks input/output details and doesn't explain what compliance data represents. data.current_description: List inventory data for all VM instances in the specified zone.
data.summary_suggestion: List software and package inventory for VM instances
data.description_suggestion: Lists inventory data for all Compute Engine VM instances in a specified location.
